Text.Page:
No matter how many cultists we kill, they recruit more...or however they make them. The {@LinkCreature:18#20#Lokian slayers} and {@LinkCreature:18#24#sanguinars} are the worst of them.

I'd do it myself if I could, but since I can't, can I count on you to thin their numbers a bit?

You're better than Anaka let on.

Thanks for your work here.
